description:
• Working with various engineering teams to understand source data composition and structures.
  • Partnering with our Business Systems team to design and deliver software that meets the needs of our rapidly scaling business by applying creativity and technical rigor to building a best-in-class financial systems architecture.
  • Delivering clean and efficient solutions which eliminate operational risks and manual procedures.

benefit:
• Amazing team: Work with the smartest and most hard working people you’ve ever met. Our team is from Google, Facebook, Lyft, Apple, Oracle, GREE,  and other best companies in Vietnam.
  • Competitive compensation package: Great salary, bonuses, and stock options. There is no upper limit on how much you can earn. It’s all based on your performance and contributions
  • Best working environment: Coffee shop like open office space, kitchen with full of snacks and drinks, West lake view bar, video games, 3D TV, soccer table, etc.
  • Latest gadgets for work: MacBook Pro Retina 15”, external HD display, latest smartphones and tablets.
  • Training and personal development: Tuition and textbook reimbursement for approved work-related courses. Free video training programs from Lynda.com, Udacity, Udemy, and The Great Courses Plus. Free English classes of your choice. Company library with full of newest technology and business books.
  • Flexible working hours
  • Gyms, fitness and sports: Full-service gym memberships, soccer or extra dollars in your pocket to spend on your own fitness, swimming, dancing
  • Frequent trips to the Silicon Valley
  • Free daily lunches and dinners
  • Others: Office happy hours, weekly lunch out, monthly team outing, participating self-organized clubs like sports, games, algorithms, piano, etc.
description:
• Build and deploy Got It platform on AWS cloud infrastructure.
  • Build tools and solutions that will drive continuous improvement around monitoring, performance, reliability, availability & scalability of our infrastructure.
  • Responsible for capacity planning, monitoring service KPIs and enforcing SLAs.
  • Operate as primary point of contact for production incident response and perform root cause analysis.
  • Optimize for security, performance, and cost
requirement:
• 2+ year experience as a DevOps/SRE Engineer.
  • Deep understanding and experience with AWS services (VPC, EC2, ELB, RDS, CloudFront, CloudFormation, CloudWatch, S3, etc).
  • Experience in Linux/UNIX administration, configuration, networking infrastructure and security.
  • Experience automating tasks with scripting languages such as Python, Bash, and JavaScript.
  • Ability to maintain, monitor and optimize production database servers.
  • Experience with automation, configuration management and CD (like Terraform and Ansible)
  • Experience debugging system, networking and security issues on large-scale distributed systems.
  • Deep understanding of service metrics through the development of dashboards, service KPIs, monitoring and alarming systems.
  • Experience working in an operational environment with strict SLAs and managed incident response and disaster recovery strategies.
  • Experience managing micro-service architectures (Kubernetes, Helm, Istio, Envoy, Apache Kafka).
  • Excellent English skills.
  • BS/MS in Computer Science or equivalent.
  • Experience with Google Cloud Platform and Azure.
  • Experience in backend development in Python or Node.js or PHP, MySQL, Caching, Message queue

benefit:
• 13 month salary per year
  • Performance bonus (up to 2-month salary)
  • Flexible option bonus for good performers & retention bonus for outstanding performers
  • Social – Health – Insurance paid fully
  • Healthcare: Annual health check-up, Premium Health Insurance (plus 1 slot for your dependent)
  • Annual leaves: 14 ~ 18 days
  • Clubs program: Football, Badminton, Swimming, Tennis, Rock, Yoga…
  • Training courses: Technical skills – Soft skills – English
  • Professional and Flexible Working Environment
  • Great Teamwork

description:
• To design, document and implement technical solutions for various type/size systems, and fully aware the integration, maintenance and migration aspects
  • To be the escalation point for technical issues of all technical issues in project.
  • To provide software architecture design
  • To ensure compliance with architecture design
  • To set guidelines, review architecture alternatives, and perform technical evaluations
  • To spend time as a technical leader / software architect in projects directly and on daily basis.
  • Communicating project technical issues and progress with clients 
  • To help Clients in technical support
  • To self-train on new technologies
  • To implement strictly all the customer’s process if being requested, company’s processes and systems complied with CMMi standard 
  • To support for presales activities (technical proposal and estimation)
  • To support for recruitment in the company
  • To perform trainings/seminars.
requirement:
• Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Ajax (object oriented with JavaScript, HTML standard compliance, newer HTM5/CSS3 )
  • Strong knowledge of PHP/NodeJS development
  • Strong knowledge of Linux, web application deployment and maintenance
  • Strong knowledge of web service development (RESTful/SOAP)
  • Strong knowledge of security in web development 
  • Strong knowledge of performance optimization
  • Good knowledge of cloud-based application development (AWS/Azure) is a plus
  • Good knowledge of Microservices architecture is a plus
  • Good knowledge of enterprise integration is a plus 
  • Good knowledge of containerization and microservices orchestration (Docker/Docker Swarm/Kubernetes) is a plus.

benefit:
• Remote work: 2-4 days/month
  • Annual leave
  • Salary review twice/year
  • Insurance regime is provided
description:

  • Taking ownership of the features you design and develop right through into usage
  • Peer-reviewing other members’ work

description:
• Work with young and talent engineers with a great teamwork
  • You will be proud of producing software applications that millions people are using every days
  • Long-term project with top clients in the world
  • Very attractive salary and annual salary review.
  • Responsible for Project Manager within agreed budget and time constraints, whilst maintaining control of the scope and impact of changes through a formal sign-off process.
  • Responsible for effectively initiating, planning, scheduling, estimating, forecasting, coordinating, controlling, managing and ensure the quality of the deliveries.
  • Will be in charge of daily follow up on team tickets and reports.
  • Apply all Agile Scrum Best Practices : daily stand-up, follow-up, sprint planning, retrospective, etc.
  • Development Status, Progress, Issues and Risks. Escalate project, client and staff issues.
  • Working with team lead to manage development staffs and assign works according to development project needs.
  • Working relationships: Reporting to Directors and Customer (Key Contact Point) on.
requirement:
• Proven experience as software development management, specifically mobile development (Android, iOS), .Net, NodeJS, ReactJS, Angular2+, etc software development, in the IT industry delivering large scale, mission critical projects, ideally from a Software Vendor perspective.
  • Experience in Agile / Scrum methodology / working process
  • Excellent in problem solving and conflict solving.
  • Excellent communication skills and strong negotiation skill. Able to communicate with internal stakeholder and client expectations from the outset
  • Able to be assertive, whilst maintaining a strong relationship
  • Proven experience in administration in areas of documentation and reporting
  • Strong leadership qualities and able to lead by example
  • Able to manage developers with various skills sets and years of experience whilst gaining their respect
  • Good logical & analytical problem resolution skills.
  • Able to work toward tight deadlines and in pressure situations
  • Whilst maintaining a clear thought process
  • Experience in hand on technical development is a big plus.
  • Experience in working with Business Analysts/Product Owners to drive the Requirements, Design and quotation preparation process is a big plus.

benefit:

description:
• Phân tích và phát triển phần mềm/hệ thống theo tài liệu thiết kế.
  • Tiến hành kiểm thử chất lượng phần mềm/hệ thống (Testing).
  • Quản lý tiến độ và báo cáo hàng ngày.
  • Bảo trì, sửa chữa phần mềm/hệ thống.
  • Triển khai phần mềm/hệ thống theo sự chỉ đạo của công ty.
  • Đào tạo và tham gia các khóa đào tạo theo sự chỉ đạo của công ty.
requirement:
• Có ít nhất 1 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc với một trong các ngôn ngữ lập trình sau: Java, PHP, Android, iOS, Mysql, HML, CSS, Javascript…
  • Làm việc và tư duy như một full-stack developer và không phụ thuộc vào ngôn ngữ lập trình hay công nghê.
  • Sẵn sàng học hỏi công nghệ hoặc ngôn ngữ lập trình mới để đáp ứng nhu cầu công việc theo từng dự án (làm cả web và mobile app nếu được yêu cầu).
  • Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các framework như Laravel, CakePHP… là một lợi thế.
  • Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các hệ thống lớn, xử lý dữ liệu lớn… sẽ là một lợi thế.
  • Sử dụng thuần thục GIT.
  • Có thể sử dụng Tiếng Anh đọc hiểu và nghiên cứu công nghệ.
  • Không yêu cầu tiếng Nhật, tuy nhiên biết tiếng Nhật sẽ là một lợi thế.
  • Yêu thích và đam mê tìm hiểu công nghệ, kỹ thuật mới.
  • Có khả năng làm việc nhóm và làm việc dưới môi trường áp lực cao.

description:
• Develop and provide API for BAEMIN service;
  • Work using TypeScript, Node.js, MongoDB, Redis, AWS;
  • Collaborating with the front-end developers and other team members to establish objectives and design more functional, cohesive codes to enhance the user experience;
  • Analyze and improve efficiency, scalability, and stability of our system;
  • Working time: 5 days/week, 9 am – 5:30 pm
  • Working place: 22nd Floor, Etown Central Building, 11 Doan Van Bo, Ward 12, Dist 4, HCMC
requirement:
• A degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or experiences in related fields. (IT, Software)
  • 3+ years of server-side software engineering experience
  • 1+ years of coding experience in JavaScript or TypeScript
  • Knowledge and experiences in NoSQL (e.g. MongoDB)
  • Knowledge and experiences in cloud base infrastructure (e.g. AWS, GCP)

description:
• Work closely with business, operation and product/engineering teams to understand their objectives and provide data-driven solutions and recommendations.

  • Keep monitoring and analyze the operational data to find implications and insights.
  • Analyze market information and user behavior data to determine what we need to do for improving our service.
  • Working time: 5 days/week, 9 am – 5:30 pm
  • Working place: 22nd Floor, Etown Central Building, 11 Doan Van Bo, Ward 12, Dist 4, HCMC
requirement:

description:
• You will be joining an awesome startup team to build cool applications that serve millions of users, from idea to production.
  • As our customers are typically ambitious foreign startups, you will have a chance to improve your English, learn about startup culture and product mindset along the way. If you want to make a great impact on the world, this is your chance now.
  • Managing full lifecycle customer projects with Agile methods.
  • Developing strong relationships with customers, acting as the primary point of contact as well as managing stakeholder expectations and always seek for solution improvement.
  • Perks
    • Macbook Pro
    • Loyalty bonus scheme (up to $45,000)
    • Work onsite - overseas
  • Macbook Pro

  • Work onsite - overseas
requirement:
• Have worked intensively with web applications (at least 2 years)

  • Have used some CSS frameworks (Bootstrap / Foundation / Material, ...)
  • Be familiar with web dev tools (Gulp / WebPack / Less / Sass, ...)
  • Be proficient in Git and know how to resolve issues

  • Have good grip on Object Oriented Programming and Functional Programming
  • Good English communication.

description:
• Plan, design, implement, test, and document application code in adherence to functional and non-functional (performance, scalability, security, usability) business requirements.
  • Work with technical leads, project management, product owners, technical architects, and testing staff to develop and deploy high-quality applications.
  • As part of an agile team, share responsibility for refining, planning, and estimating the duration and complexity of tasks.
  • Unit test all new software thoroughly to ensure the highest quality levels possible.
  • Can work on both large and small projects, with the same attention to detail.
  • Look at a problem pragmatically, and choose the solution based on what is fit-for-purpose.
  • Deliver within acceptable timescales, to agreed quality standards.
  • Provide support for production applications, ensuring highest availability through urgent correction of problems and issues.
  • Produce updates to system documentation for completed developments to support defect resolution.
  • Utilize system analysis skills to translate business requirements into use cases and produce system designs to agreed standards.
  • Work with project management, product owners and senior technical staff to analyze and clarify clients requirements and minimize ambiguities.
  • Ability to understand business requirements and translate into technical requirements.
  • Ability to communicate technical information to a non-technical audience.
  • Multi-task and work on multiple projects with varying priorities and deadlines.
  • Integrate in-house and third-party software components to create the designed system.
  • Work with operations and support teams to deploy applications to various environments and ensure they can be supported.
requirement:
• BS/MS in Computer Science or equivalent skills or knowledge.
  • 3+ years of end-to-end experience in developing, packaging and distributing SaaS applications
  • Proficiency with fundamental front-end languages (HTML, CSS, and JavaScript).
  • Proficiency with server-side languages such as PHP and .Net.
  • Proficiency with database technology, especially MySQL.
  • Proficiency with API Creation and RESTful services
  • Familiarity with JavaScript frameworks such as Angular JS, ReactJS, NodeJS (is a plus)
  • Excellent verbal communication skills.
  • Good problem-solving skills.
  • Strong organizational and project management skills.
  • Attention to detail.

description:

  • Xử lý sự cố: Đảm bảo các thiết bị máy móc luôn hoạt động ổn định, khi gặp sự cố, bộ phận công nghệ phải trực tiếp xử lý sự cố trong thời gian nhanh nhất. Nắm vững luật chơi, giải đáp tất cả các thắc mắc liên quan đến sự cố máy móc, thiết bị.
